name: pixel-camera
description: Take a photo on the Pixel using the device camera via Termux. Use when the user says 'take a picture', 'what am I holding?', 'photo', or 'capture'. Requires Termux + termux-api. Image can be passed to a vision model for description.

tools.name: take_photo
tools.description: Take a photo with the device camera. Use for 'take a picture', 'what do I see', or to capture an image for later description. Prefer back camera (0) for objects; front (1) for selfie.

path.description: Optional absolute path for the JPEG file on device. Default: ~/camera_capture.jpg
